Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Changelog:
- UI Adjustments:
  - Changed the Graphs and Languages buttons to display as icon buttons.
  - Adjusted the position of the Graphs button.
  - Changed the way data charts are drawn.
- Functional Adjustments:
  - Now allows selection of individual rows in the data charts with corresponding functionality.
  - Now allows right-clicking on a cell within the data chart to copy its content.
